con:testCase.name: AC07-Closed account
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for AC04-Closed account

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and CLOSED = 'Y' and ROWNUM=1

con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID = '${Properties#MsgID}' and PAYMENTSTATUS = 'REJC'
select * from STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF where FK_STATUSREASONID in ('${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/STATUSREASONID[1]}')
